ch.supertomcat.bh.settings.options

Class Subdir

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.supertomcat.bh.settings.options.Subdir

  • public class Subdir
extends java.lang.Object
    The user can define subdirectory were the files are moved to after download is completed. The files are moved, when the filesize are in the defined range.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int RESOLUTION_BOTH
      Both
      static int RESOLUTION_ONLY_HEIGHT
      Only height is checked
      static int RESOLUTION_ONLY_HIGHER
      Only the higher component of the resolution is checked
      static int RESOLUTION_ONLY_LOWER
      Only the lower component of the resolution is checked
      static int RESOLUTION_ONLY_WIDTH
      Only width is checked
